verses.name: Jeremiah 26:13
verses.text: Therefore now amend your ways and your doings, and obey the voice of the Lord your God; and the Lord will repent him of the evil that he hath pronounced against you.

verses.name: Jeremiah 26:14
verses.text: As for me, behold, I am in your hand: do with me as seemeth good and meet unto you.

verses.name: Jeremiah 26:15
verses.text: But know ye for certain, that if ye put me to death, ye shall surely bring innocent blood upon yourselves, and upon this city, and upon the inhabitants thereof: for of a truth the Lord hath sent me unto you to speak all these words in your ears.
